headline: Will FedEx’s (FDX) Credit Moves and Freight Spin-Off Reshape Its Long-Term Business Stability Narrative?
summary: In recent days, FedEx amended its US$3.5 billion credit agreements with major banks to prepare for the planned spin-off of FedEx Freight by June 2026 while managing operational changes after grounding its MD-11 aircraft fleet amid heightened industry safety measures. This dual focus on financial restructuring and risk response reinforces FedEx's commitment to logistics continuity and long-term business stability during a period of industry and regulatory uncertainty. We'll assess how FedEx's...

headline: Aurora Innovation (AUR) Closes Q3 2025 With $1.6 Billion in Liquidity
summary: With significant upside potential and hedge fund interest, Aurora Innovation, Inc. (NASDAQ:AUR) secured a spot on our list of the 15 stocks set to explode in 2026. On October 28, 2025, Aurora Innovation, Inc. (NASDAQ:AUR) released its Q3 2025 results. The quarter marked a 12% sequential growth in revenue, bringing it to $1 million, thanks […]
